column1: # BOUNDARY CONDITIONS: SAIGON-DONG NAI CASE (Y-into-Y Network)
# Network: 2 upstream discharge BCs → Junction → 2 downstream tidal BCs
# Node 1: Tri An Dam discharge (Dong Nai upstream)
# Node 2: Dau Tieng Reservoir discharge (Saigon upstream)
# Node 3: Nha Be Confluence (Junction - no BC needed)
# Note: Can use same tidal forcing if mouths are close
# for phase differences between Soai Rap and Long Tau
